title: The View From Here
description: This book is no longer in publication. However, Kindred Series Books 1-4 purchased after 14th June 2013 also contain the chapter from Michel's POV applicable for that book.A free eBook showing a series of chapters (one from each of the first four books) in the Kindred Series from Michel's Point of View. WARNING: Some background information and plot spoilers may be found in these chapters.Get to know our sexy Master of the City and see the Kindred world from his perspective. Gain an insight into his relationship with Lucinda, the vampires of his line and his very old friendship with Gregor Morel. Michel as you have never seen him before: vulnerable, besotted, loyal and hungry for the Nosferatin in his sights.This compendium includes the following chapters from Michel's point of view:Book One Kindred, chapter 2: Master Knows BestBook Two Blood Life Seeker, chapter 3: SecretsBook Three Forbidden Drink, chapter 23: The SpyBook Four Giver of Light, chapter 2: Pick-Up Lines
author: Nicola Claire
